document.full_text: forty-one young semi-finalists were competing on thursday to see who will make the final round to determine the title of best speller in the annual scripps national spelling bee.
document.title: forty-one reach national spelling bee semi-finals
lines_and_colors: forty-one young semi-finalists were competing on thursday to see who will make the final round to determine the title of best speller in the annual scripps national spelling bee.
